ValidationRule.description: Sales team must use bundle SKUs for AG2 hardware and cables.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula:
AND(
OR( ISPICKVAL(StageName,"Incubate"), ISPICKVAL(StageName,"Qualified"), ISPICKVAL(StageName,"Purchase"), ISPICKVAL(StageName,"Trial"), ISPICKVAL(StageName,"Proposal"), ISPICKVAL(StageName,"Decision"), ISPICKVAL(StageName,"Closing")),
NOT(OR( ($Permission.Validation_Rule_Exemption), ($Profile.Name="Order Operations Admin"), (ISPICKVAL(Type, "Promo Opportunity")) )),
OR( AG2_Separate_Hardware_and_Cable_Count__c >0),
Can_Sell_Separate_AG2_Hardware_Cables__c = false)
ValidationRule.errorMessage: You must use the bundle SKUs when adding AG24 hardware and cables.
